data.name: Model X Cargo Net
data.description: Secure your cargo and enhance your utility capabilities with Model X Cargo Net. The stretchable elastic netting will safely protect fragile items or more secure cargo like sports equipment or luggage.
data.note: Compatible with all Model X Six and Seven Seat interior configurations.

data.name: Model X Falcon Wing Sunshades
data.description: Constructed of lightweight mesh fabric with a collapsible rigid frame, the Model X Falcon Wing Roof Sunshades block two thirds of solar thermal load. Easily removable, the sunshades are installed onto the interior of the roof windows. When removed, the shades can be stored in the provided storage pouch.
data.note: Compatible with Model X vehicles produced in 2015-2020.

data.name: Model X Rear Liftgate Sunshade
data.description: Constructed of lightweight mesh fabric with a collapsible rigid frame, the Model X Rear Liftgate Sunshade blocks two thirds of solar thermal load without compromising rearward visibility. Easily removable, the sunshade is installed onto the interior of the rear liftgate window. When removed, the shade collapses and stores in the provided pouch.
data.note: Compatible with Model X vehicles produced in 2015-2020.

data.name: Model X Car Cover
data.description: Shield your Tesla from the harshest of elements with this Outdoor Car Cover. With a middle layer of Thermoplastic Polyurethane and two outer layers of woven polyester, the cover allows for breathability while providing the best water resistance available today. Convenient charge port openings allow for connection to an outlet, and ventilated mesh allow for air flow while charging
data.note: Compatible with all Model X vehicles.

data.name: Model X/Y Ski/Snowboard Carrier for Hitch Rack
data.description: Conveniently stow your skis and snowboards on the exterior of your Model X/Y. The Model X/Y Ski/Snowboard Carrier is easily assembled and allows for lockable storage with soft rubber coated arms that secure equipment without the risk of scratching ski or snowboard surfaces.
data.note: This item must be used in conjunction with the Model X/Y Hitch Rack. When carrying bicycles or other items on the Model X/Y Hitch Rack, always check to ensure that the maximum weight is not exceeded. The Model X/Y Hitch Rack is designed to support loads of up to 120lbs. Compatible with all Model X and Model Y vehicles.

data.name: Model X/Y Hitch Rack
data.description: Designed exclusively for Tesla, the Model X/Y Hitch Rack is a premium tilt-down hitch rack that comes fully assembled out of the box. Installation is a breeze with the AutoPin™ and locking SpeedKnob™. New ZipStrips™ make loading and securing bikes simpler than ever. Padded arms cradle your bike's frame and can be folded down when not in use. Need to access the rear of your Model X/Y? Simply tilt the rack down with the conveniently located UpperHand™ lever. An integrated, same key security system locks your bikes and rack in place.
data.note: Tow hitch required. When carrying bicycles or other items on the Model X/Y Hitch Rack, always check to ensure that the maximum weight is not exceeded. The Model X/Y Hitch Rack is designed to support loads of up to 120lbs. For carrying skis/snowboards, the Model X/Y Ski/Snowboard Carrier for Hitch Rack is sold separately. Compatible with all Model X and Model Y vehicles.

data.name: 2015-2020 | Model X 20" Sonic Carbon Slipstream Wheel and Tire Package
data.description: Outfit your Model X with 20" Sonic Carbon Slipstream Tesla wheels and Continental CrossContact LX Sport tires for sporty appearance and year-round traction.
data.note: Compatible with Model X vehicles produced in 2015-2020. Lug nuts and lug nut covers sold separately. Should you need to purchase an individual wheel or tire, please contact your preferred Tesla Service Center. Once you have completed checkout for this item, please schedule a Service appointment for installation in your Tesla app. Shipping to your preferred Tesla Service Center and installation are included with purchase.

data.name: 2015-2020 | Model X 20" Slipstream Wheel and Winter Tire Package
data.description: Outfit your Model X with 20" Slipstream Tesla wheels and Pirelli Scorpion winter-rated tires for the icy months ahead.
data.note: Compatible with Model X vehicles produced in 2015-2020. Lug nuts and lug nut covers sold separately. Should you need to purchase an individual wheel or tire, please contact your preferred Tesla Service Center. Once you have completed checkout for this item, please schedule a Service appointment for installation in your Tesla app. Shipping to your preferred Tesla Service Center and installation are included with purchase

data.name: 2015-2020 | Model X 22" Turbine Wheel and Pirelli Scorpion Tire Package
data.description: Outfit your Model X with 22" Tesla Turbine wheels and Pirelli high performance tires to sharpen steering response and increase cornering stability.
data.note: Compatible with Model X vehicles produced in 2015-2020. Lug nuts and lug nut covers sold separately. Should you need to purchase an individual wheel or tire, please contact your preferred Tesla Service Center. Once you have completed checkout for this item, please schedule a Service appointment for installation in your Tesla app. Shipping to your preferred Tesla Service Center and installation are included with purchase

data.name: 2015-2020 | Model X Carpet Interior Mats
data.description: Model X Carpet Interior Mats offer comfortable floor protection with a thick, durable pile and come treated for stain and soil resistance.
data.note: Compatible with Model X vehicles produced in 2015-2020.

data.name: 2015-2020 | Model X All-Weather Interior Liners
data.description: Tesla Model X All-Weather Floor Liners are custom made using the latest in digital laser measurements for your Model X. This extreme-duty floor protection covers and protects your Model X by keeping it free from dirt and spills. The floor liners are made from thermoplastic elastomer material which has a rigid core for unbeatable strength and easy cleanups.
data.note: Choose your vehicle configuration and build date in the drop down for Model X compatibility.
